verses.text: Many a time have they afflicted me from my youth, May Israel now say:
Many a time have they afflicted me from my youth: Yet they have not prevailed against me.
The plowers plowed upon my back: They made long their furrows.
The Lordisrighteous: He hath cut asunder the cords of the wicked.
Let them all be confounded and turned back That hate Zion.
Let them be as the grass upon the housetops, Which withereth afore it groweth up:
Wherewiththe mower filleth not his hand; Nor he that bindeth sheaves his bosom.
Neither do they which go by say, The blessing of the Lordbeupon you: We bless you in the name of the Lord.
